summary: ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITIONS SENSOR FAILS RESULTING IN IMMEDIATE SPEED REDUCTION IN TRAFFIC.  WHILE DRIVING ON A HIGHWAY THIS HAPPENED WITH SPEED GOING FROM 55 TO 15 ALMOST AS IF PUTTING ON BRAKES.  DEALER REPLACED APPS AND IT FAILED AGAIN IN LESS THAN 18 MONTHS.  NO ACCIDENT OCCURRED BUT SURELY COULD HAVE IF OTHER DRIVERS WERE FOLLOWING CLOSER.
